column5: William Hill Christmas Meeting Up Next Handicap Hurdle (Go North Sea Pigeon Series Qualifier)
column20: In touch with leaders on inner - lost ground before 4 out - dropped to last before 3 out - soon hung left and weakened quickly(tchd 5/1)

column5: William Hill Christmas Meeting Up Next Handicap Hurdle (Go North Sea Pigeon Series Qualifier)
